alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 11:01PM MST until January 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...A mix of light snow and freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Eastern Fremont, Huerfano, and Western Las Animas Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense freezing fog with visibility of one quarter mile or less and additional light icing is expected tonight into early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
